name: Android Apps by Aravind Sagar
body:
## [Screen Shift](http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-screen-shift-change-screen-t3138718)
A simple, and beautifully designed app to change screen resolution, overscan and density.

## [SmartLockScreen](http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-smartlockscreen-android-enjoy-t2919989)
An advanced lockscreen add-on which provides some Lollipop style smart locking and more, in devices running JB and above.

### Contact
[Google+](https://plus.google.com/+AravindSagar)

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/aravind.sagar)

### Site under construction
Will update with more info soon!
Apps will also be put up in play store soon.
